Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Michelle M. Ress "safoocat"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera that is easy to use, good battery life, great pictures, and I love the memory sticks. The only issue you might have is that it's rather large.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I Have Ever Owned
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey B. Naumann
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera since it first came out in 2001. It takes exceptional pictures for only 2.0 megapixels and the original lithium battery still holds a 114 minute charge just like it did 12 years ago. I wouldn't trade it for a 10 megapixel camera at less than half the price! It's that good. Get yourself a usb floppy drive for your computer and some cheap floppy disks and have a ball with it. Very high quality product, something you don't see much of anymore. Highly Recommended!!! Just bought another one yesterday. Thought I better grab another one before they are no longer available.

Reviews.Title: Had this for years!
Reviews.Author: R. M. Bruce "treasuresqueen"
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone since it came out in 2001.  It takes great pictures - even still!  The only thing is there is no sound with the video/movie recordings, but the pictures are still awesome 7 years later!  People make fun of my big bulky camera but they are speechless when it comes to the camera.  I wouldnt change it for the world!

ProductInfo.Features:
Battery Charger (AC Adapter)
Rechargable Battery
Lens Cap
Shoulder Strap
USB Cable
ProductInfo.Name: SONMVCFD200 Mavica® MVC-FD200 2.0 Megapixel Digital Camera
